ygData.subject: Re: Using Trade window against KSers.
ygData.msgSnippet: ... You don t determine what is and is not bannable, though. Verant does. And Verant has said this is a bannable offense. Good thing, IMHO. I don t want a jerk
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 3 Aug 1999, Patrick Myers wrote:

> How can that be bannable if they can just turn off their trade
> window...believe me.. i will be trying this to the next ks that takes my
> trainer....bwahahah....

You don't determine what is and is not bannable, though. Verant does.
And Verant has said this is a bannable offense.

Good thing, IMHO. I don't want a jerk able to continually harass
me/get me killed by trying to trade with me when I am fighting.
And I really don't want to have to keep trades turned off all the
timne to "defend myself" This SHOULD be a bannable offense.


===================================================
Sarah sarah@...
===================================================
My picture of the world is of masses of people extending gifts to other
people, doing favors -- but nobody keeping score. -- Dr. Whitsett
===================================================
